mapper.select: SELECT A.DATASEQ, A.WORKDAILY_SEQ, B.RULESYSID, B.FACTORYID, B.LINEID, B.SHIFTID, B.WORK_DATE, A.NOTOPERATETIME_FROM, A.NOTOPERATETIME_TO, A.HANDS, A.MANHOUR, A.CAUSE, A.CORRECTIVE_ACTION, A.NOTES, A.IMAGES, A.MOVIES, A.CREATOR, A.CREATETIME, A.EVENT, A.EVENTUSER, A.EVENTTIME, A.ISUSABLE, B.TID FROM DSP_NOTOPERATE_CONTENTS A JOIN DSP_WORKDAILY_REPORT B ON A.WORKDAILY_SEQ = B.DATASEQ WHERE 1=1 AND WORKDAILY_SEQ = #{workdailySeq}
